doc.title: Allez allez
doc.plot: Allez Allez is a tour de force through film history. Allez Allez - french for "come on!" Along the tokem. Allong the différance. sveltezza. A tokem is a cinematic indication, that differs, its meaning changes over the years. This change is the so called différance. Sveltezza. Keep on mobile in reading films. The animation is made of the first moving pictures in film history - made by Eadweard Muybridge. He experimented with fotography and the possibility of movement starting in the 1880s. His "movies" inspirated artists during the years untill now, e.g. Marcel Duchamp: Nude Descending a Staircase.
